item.title: New board
item.description: We are pleased to annouce that a new board for IAPR TC 18 "Digital Geometry" has been appointed, consisting of Ullrich Koethe (Chair), Joost Batenburg (Vice Chair), Guillaume Damiand (Vice Chair).
